#include "stdio.h"
#include "string.h"
#include "math.h"
#define pc putchar_unlocked
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define ll long long unsigned int
inline ll r()
{
	ll x=0;
	char c=gc();
	while(c<48||c>57)
	c=gc();
	while(c>=48&&c<=57)
	{
		x=x*10+c-48;
		c=gc();
	}	
return x;
}
int main()
{
	ll ba,t,i,j,sum,mod,nu;
	t=r();	j=0;
	while(t--)
	{	
		nu=r();	ba=r();	i=0;	sum=0;
		while(nu)
		{
			mod=nu%10;
			sum+=mod*pow(ba,i);
			i++;
			nu/=10;
		}
		pc(sum);
	}
	pc('\n');
return 0;
}
